s2.ptxt: Attach the 18 claws to install the lower No. 1 radiator grille.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT BUMPER HOLE COVER LH (w/o Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 5 claws to install the front bumper hole cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT BUMPER HOLE COVER RH (w/o Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT COVER LH (w/ Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 5 claws to install the fog light cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT COVER RH (w/ Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH (w/ Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 guides to install the fog light assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT ASSEMBLY RH (w/ Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
